actions.description: The skitterwidget makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it is grappled by the skitterwidget (escape DC 13).
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) piercing damage plus 10 (3d6) lightning damage, and if the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of its next turn.
actions.name: Tail

conditionImmunities: blinded, deafened, exhaustion, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned
name: Skitterwidget

specialTraits.description: Whenever the skitterwidget is subjected to lightning damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the lightning damage dealt.
specialTraits.name: Lightning Absorption

specialTraits.description: The skitterwidget doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.
specialTraits.name: Unusual Nature
